heroDesc: Upload an image or text. Get a quiz in seconds. Powered by AI.
feature1Desc: Instant multiple-choice and true/false questions from text or images.
feature2Desc: Upload screenshots, notes, or scanned files — we extract and quiz it.
feature3Desc: Take quizzes and see results instantly with performance tips.
feature4Desc: View past quizzes, scores, and quiz history in your dashboard.
faq1a: QuizRush is an AI-powered platform that lets you create, take, and manage quizzes from text or images.
faq2a: We use OpenAI and OCR technologies to turn your input into quality quiz questions instantly.
faq3q: Can I track my quiz history?
faq3a: Yes! Your attempts, scores, and performance are stored and viewable in your profile.
faq4a: Yes. It’s free for students and teachers. Premium features coming soon!
faq5a: Absolutely! Upload screenshots or documents and our system extracts text for quiz generation.
